name: Classic Crane
description: An iconic symbol of peace and hope, this handcrafted crane offers timeless elegance and a must-have for any origami collection.

name: Samurai Helmet
description: A carefully folded samurai helmet (Kabuto) that adds a touch of historic charm to any shelf or desk.
byline: Festival favorite for kids and collectors

name: Paper Balloon (Kami Fusen)
description: A delightful, airy paper balloon that looks charming hung around the home or used as festive decor.

name: Jumping Frog
description: An adorable frog figurine that can spring into action with a gentle tap, bringing playful energy wherever it goes.

images.alt: Green origami frog from the side
Green origami frog from the top

name: Kabuto (Deluxe Variation)
description: This elaborately folded Kabuto features refined details and multiple layers, a must-have for collectors seeking authenticity.
byline: An advanced twist on the classic Kabuto

name: Paper Fan
description: A handcrafted paper fan designed for both style and function, perfect for warm days or decorative displays.

images.alt: Paper fan with a simple fold

name: Origami Box
description: A sturdy, single-sheet folded box that’s ideal for storing keepsakes or presenting small gifts.

images.alt: Compact origami box in pastel colors

name: Paper Crane Variation
description: A refined twist on the classic crane, featuring elegant decorative folds in the wings for added charm.
byline: A stylish twist on the classic crane

name: Flower Kusudama
description: A stunning ornament made by assembling multiple flower-like units into a cheerful sphere.

name: Star Kusudama
description: An eye-catching, star-themed kusudama that adds sparkle to any setting with its intricate geometry.

name: Daisy Kusudama
description: Bright and uplifting, this floral kusudama features daisy-inspired petals that radiate cheerful energy.

name: Christmas Ornament Kusudama
description: A festive ornament kusudama with seasonal red and green units, bringing holiday spirit to your decor.

name: Sakura Blossom Kusudama
description: Inspired by cherry blossoms, this kusudama captures the delicate elegance and freshness of spring.

name: Heart Kusudama
description: A delightful kusudama where each module is folded into a subtle heart shape, perfect for loved ones.

name: Modular Floral Sphere
description: A lively arrangement of petal-shaped units forming a burst of color, perfect for brightening any room.

images.alt: Colorful modular sphere with floral design

name: Geometric Petal Ball
description: Sleek geometry meets graceful petals in this kusudama, offering a balanced blend of modern style and organic warmth.

images.alt: Geometric petal ball with symmetrical folds

name: Sonobe Cube
description: A classic modular piece crafted from Sonobe units, forming a perfect cube that’s fun to assemble.

images.alt: Simple sonobe cube in bright colors

name: Sonobe Icosahedron
description: Twenty Sonobe units come together to form a mesmerizing icosahedron, great for geometry lovers.

images.alt: Complex sonobe icosahedron in vibrant hues

name: Alpha Star
description: A radiant star made from interlocking panels, reflecting light beautifully when hung near windows.

name: Omega Cube
description: An advanced modular origami design that refines the classic cube into a more complex, eye-catching piece.
byline: A twist on the classic cube

name: Triangular Box
description: A handy triangular box with interlocking sides, perfect for storing small knickknacks or gifting sweets.

name: Hexahedron Puzzle
description: An engaging puzzle that challenges you to form a stable hexahedron from folded units, perfect for advanced enthusiasts.

images.alt: Challenging hexahedron puzzle in bold colors

name: Modular Photo Frame
description: A customizable, interlocking photo frame that expands with additional modules, adding flair to cherished memories.

images.alt: Paper frame featuring a modular design

name: Peace Crane Modular Wreath
description: Crane modules arranged in a ring, this wreath brings serenity and unity to any entryway or mantle.

name: Hydrangea Tessellation
description: A breathtaking pattern that mimics clusters of hydrangea blooms, showcasing delicate folds across the sheet.

name: Twisted Hexagon Fold
description: Hypnotic and dynamic, this hexagonal tessellation appears to twist before your eyes, adding a modern flair.

name: Square Grid Tessellation
description: A simpler design using square pleats, ideal for beginners seeking a subtle 3D texture in their origami.

images.alt: Neat square pleats forming a grid

name: Waterbomb Tessellation
description: A vibrant mosaic of interlocking waterbomb folds, creating a tactile, bumpy surface that draws the eye.

name: Clover Tessellation
description: Soft, rounded leaves that repeat across the page, this design brings a touch of natural charm to any setting.

name: Pleated Rose Tessellation
description: Rose-shaped pleats that bloom gracefully, offering a sophisticated and rewarding challenge for experienced folders.

images.alt: Rose-like pleats forming a floral pattern

name: Sunburst Corrugation
description: A radial corrugation design that catches light beautifully, evoking the brilliance of a rising sun.

images.alt: Radiating corrugated lines in a sunburst pattern

name: Ripple Pattern Fold
description: Undulating wave-like pleats move across the paper, adding a dynamic, contemporary style to this tessellation.

images.alt: Wavy pleats in a ripple arrangement
Close-up of the ripple fold texture

name: Origami Dragon
description: A fierce, mythical creation with delicate wings and a curling tail, perfect for showcasing expert folding skills.

images.alt: Detailed origami dragon with outspread wings

name: Butterfly Delight
description: A colorful butterfly piece that brightens any display, capturing the whimsical spirit of these gentle creatures.

images.alt: Vibrant butterfly origami with wings spread

name: Origami Turtle
description: An adorable origami turtle complete with a distinctive shell pattern, perfect for displaying flat or standing upright.

images.alt: Paper turtle with a detailed shell

name: Koi Fish
description: An elegant fish model with flowing fins, celebrating the beauty and grace of the koi in traditional origami style.

images.alt: Koi fish with curved fins and tail

name: Panda Bear
description: A delightful two-toned figure with a round belly and charming expression, sure to please panda lovers of all ages.

images.alt: Black and white paper panda bear

name: Elephant Parade
description: Celebrate the majestic elephant with this carefully crafted piece, complete with extended trunk and expressive ears.

images.alt: Origami elephant with a raised trunk

name: Giraffe Silhouette
description: A tall and graceful design capturing the essence of a giraffe’s slender form, perfect for safari-themed decor.

name: Fox Head
description: An easy-to-display fox head featuring large ears and pointy muzzle, adding a playful woodland charm to your space.

images.alt: Paper fox head with prominent ears
